Message:
“They’re so warm...
It feels like I’m wrapped up
in your love and kindness...

Thank you so much, Big Sis.
I’m so happy!”

I made this
just for you, Big Sis.”

As soon as she said that,
Sol wrapped me up
in a scarf as white as snow.

like I’m wrapped up
in your love and kindness...

I just said the exact
same thing as Sol...
Hehe. I guess we are
sisters, after all.

As we found ourselves
gazing at each other,
Sol smiled as brightly
as the sun.

Always have,
and always will!
Forever and ever!”

“Yes...
I love you too, Sol.
Always have,
and always will.
Forever and ever.”
